default_faction.title: Default Faction
default_faction.description: The id of the faction the monster belongs to, this affects what other monsters it will fight. See Monster factions.

bodytype.title: Bodytype
bodytype.description: The id of the monster's bodytype, which is a general description of the layout of the monster's body.

diff.title: Difficulty (diff)
diff.description: Monster baseline difficulty. Impacts the shade used to label the monster, and if it is above 30 a kill will be recorded in the memorial log.  Difficulty should only be used for exceptional, ranged, special attacks.

baby_monster.title: Baby Monster
baby_monster.description: The monster that will spawn when giving birth

baby_count.title: Baby Count
baby_count.description: The amount of monsters that will spawn

baby_timer.title: Baby Timer
baby_timer.description: How long it takes to reproduce

age_grow.title: Age grow
age_grow.description: The age at which this monster will upgrade

into.title: Baby Monster
into.description: The monster that this monster will upgrade into

//.title: Comment
//.description: This is a comment that will only appear here but not in-game

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Monster speed. 100 is the normal speed for a human being - higher values are faster and lower values are slower.

aggression.title: Aggression
aggression.description: Defines how aggressive the monster is. Ranges from -99 (totally passive) to 100 (guaranteed hostility on detection)

melee_skill.title: Melee Skill
melee_skill.description: Monster melee skill, ranges from 0 - 10, with 4 being an average mob. See GAME_BALANCE.txt for more examples

melee_dice.title: Melee Dice
melee_dice.description: Number of dices and their sides that are rolled on monster melee attack. This defines the amount of bash damage.

melee_dice_sides.title: Melee Dice Sides
melee_dice_sides.description: Number of dices and their sides that are rolled on monster melee attack. This defines the amount of bash damage.

melee_cut.title: Melee Cut
melee_cut.description: Amount of cutting damage added to die roll on monster melee attack.

dodge.title: Dodge
dodge.description: Monster dodge skill. See GAME_BALANCE.txt for an explanation of dodge mechanics.

items.title: Anger trigger
items.description: What makes the monster angry. See JSON_FLAGS.md for a full list

items.title: Group name
items.description: The name of the group to drop from

half_life.title: Half life
half_life.description: (int) Time in which half of the monsters upgrade according to an approximated exponential progression. It is scaled with the evolution scaling factor which defaults to 4 days.

harvest.title: Harvest
harvest.description: An item that can be harvested from the corpse

burn_into.title: Burn into
burn_into.description: What it will turn into after being burned

items.title: Name
items.description: The id of the attack (see JSON_FLAGS.md for a list)

items.title: Cooldown
items.description: The cooldown for that attack in amount of turns

id.title: Id
id.description: The id of the attack (see JSON_FLAGS.md for a list)

type.title: title
type.description: The id of the attack (see JSON_FLAGS.md for a list)

cooldown.title: cooldown
cooldown.description: The cooldown for that attack in amount of turns

items.title: Mode
items.description: The mode the range applies to

items.title: Death Function
items.description: How the monster behaves on death. See JSON_FLAGS.md for a list of possible functions. One can add or remove entries in mods via 'add:death_function' and 'remove:death_function'.
